original_text: Moreover your little ones, which ye said should be a prey, and your children, which in that day had no knowledge between good and evil, they shall go in thither, and unto them will I give it, and they shall possess it.
korean_text: 또 너희가 사로잡히리라 하던 너희의 아이들과 당시에 선악을 분별하지 못하던 너희의 자녀들도 그리로 들어갈 것이라 내가 그 땅을 그들에게 주어 산업이 되게 하리라

sentences.original_text: which ye said should be a prey
which in that day had no knowledge between good and evil
sentences.korean_translation: 그 날에 선과 악을 분별하지 못했던

sentences.original_text: and unto them will I give it
